files.README.md:
# Claude Code Workflow Configuration

**Claude Code**       .

![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-11.6.0-blue) ![Last Updated](https://img.shields.io/badge/updated-2025--12--11-green)

> ** **:      , ** (Workflow)** ** (Scripts)**  .

---

##  Quick Start

### 1.   (AI & Human)
*   **[CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md)**: **()**      .
*   **[docs/QUICK_START_GUIDE.md](docs/QUICK_START_GUIDE.md)**: 5    .

### 2.   (Documentation)
*   **[docs/COMMAND_SELECTOR.md](docs/COMMAND_SELECTOR.md)**:    .
*   **[docs/AGENTS_REFERENCE.md](docs/AGENTS_REFERENCE.md)**:    .
*   **[docs/WORKFLOWS/](docs/WORKFLOWS/)**:     .
*   **[docs/GITHUB_WORKFLOW/](docs/GITHUB_WORKFLOW/)**: GitHub     .

### 3.  (Tools)
*   **Scripts**: `scripts/`  Windows Native(PowerShell)  Python   .
*   **Plugins**: `.claude-plugin/`  `.claude/`   .

---

##  Repository Structure

```
.
 CLAUDE.md                    # Core Workflow Definition (v8.0.0)
 README.md                    # Entry Point (This file)
 docs/                        # Documentation
    COMMAND_SELECTOR.md      # Command Selection Guide
    AGENTS_REFERENCE.md      # Agent & Skill Reference
    PLANNED_AGENTS.md        # Future Agents Roadmap
    WORKFLOW_REFERENCE.md    # Detailed Workflows
    GITHUB_WORKFLOW/         # GitHub Integration Docs
    WORKFLOWS/               # Actionable Recipes
 src/agents/                  # AI Workflow Agents (Python)
 .claude/commands/            # Custom Slash Commands (20)
 .claude/skills/              # Custom Skills (13)
 scripts/                     # Automation Scripts
```

##  Contribution
  Issue  PR  .
